task_description: **Financial Advisor (FA):** Hello! I'm your advisor, here to assist you with your financial goals.**Individual (I):** Hi! I'm interested in building a diversified portfolio and looking for Corporate Bond Portfolio. I consider myself conservative in terms of risk, and I have $$100,000 to allocate.**FA:** Sounds good... Any other requirement ?**I:** hmmm, yes, I am looking for something that gives tax-loss harvesting for reduced tax liability.**FA:** That aligns well with your long-term goals.
